about.title: About Me
about.description_1: I am a Fullstack Developer specialized in React, Next.js, Node.js for the web and React Native for mobile apps.
about.description_2: Passionate about development, I turn your ideas into modern websites, intuitive mobile applications, and high-performing online stores. I make each step clear and accessible, whether you are a company, freelancer, or project owner.

projects_list.title: Mbia Crypto
projects_list.description: Blockchain platform enabling crypto exchanges with legal and secure payment systems.

projects_list.title: Kipler
projects_list.description: E-commerce application that allows anyone to sell their services easily and quickly.

skills_list.desc: I use it to create fast and interactive web interfaces.

skills_list.desc: To have fast and well-structured websites with clean pages.

skills_list.desc: To style my applications easily and make interfaces beautiful.
